source_name: National Institute of Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism
name: Traffic crashes, traffic crash fatalities, and alcohol-related traffic crash fatalities in the United States
description: Data are from the Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS) maintained by the National Traffic Highway Safety Administration. Source: Alcohol Epidemiologic Data System. Yi, H., Chen, C.M., and Williams, G.D. Surveillance Report #76: Trends in Alcohol-Related Fatal Traffic Crashes, United States, 1982 - 2004. Bethesda, MD: National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism, Division of Epidemiology and Prevention Research (August 2006).
